front.title: Mobile IP NAI with Multiple Static IP Address Flows

abstract.t: A Network Access Identifier can be added to a Mobile IP RegistrationRequest to identify a user. Users may want to open severalsimultaneous sessions using the same NAI from the same or differentdevices with a unique IP address for each session. The functionalitydefined in this draft can be used to allow multiple static IP addressflows using the same NAI.
